name: @melonproject/protocol
description: Technology Regulated and Operated Investment Funds
author: Melonport AG <team@melonport.com>

scripts.devchain: ganache-cli --gasLimit 0x989680 --defaultBalanceEther 10000000000000 -m 'exhibit now news planet fame thank swear reform tilt accident bitter axis' --networkId=4 --acctKeys ./keys.json
scripts.test: LOCAL_CHAIN=true PRIVATE_KEYS=./keys.json REDEPLOY_ALL=true DEPLOY_IN=./deploy_in_testing.json DEPLOY_OUT=./deploy_out_testing.json yarn jest --runInBand --detectOpenHandles
scripts.test-kovan: PRIVATE_KEYS=./kovan_keys.json REDEPLOY_ALL=false DEPLOY_IN=./deploy_in_kovan.json DEPLOY_OUT=./deploy_out_kovan.json yarn jest --testPathIgnorePatterns '/(local|tests/mock|tests/thirdparty)/' --runInBand
